context: An incident was reported involving 'CommandAndControl' malware detected during lateral movement on the device `vnevado-win11t`. It seems that the attacker might be attempting to move laterally to this device from another device on the network. The command executed was `curl http://vectorsandarrows.com`. Additionally, suspicious remote activity was observed, raising concerns about potential malicious activities.
question: What is the Security Identifier (SID) of the account involved in the PSExec to the jump server `Vnevado-jump`?
solution_steps: 'CommandAndControl' malware was detected on the device associated with the account `dp5hn`.
Suspicious remote activity was observed on this machine from the IP address `99.83.111.100`.
Lateral movement to the jump server `Vnevado-jump` was conducted by the user with SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422`.
